title: Sword Pull
alt: Merlin really shouldn't leave his dirt bike lying around.
transcript:
[Cueball, puzzled, walks up to a sword in a stone.]
Cueball: ??[Cueball stands on the stone and attempts to pull the sword out of the stone.][Cueball continues pulling the sword out of the stone, but mechanical noises are heard]
Yank!
Zzzzz 
Put Put Put
Brrrrrrr[Cueball is still holding the sword, but is puzzled and has stopped pulling. There are more mechanical noises and the stone is vibrating]
Cueball: ?? ??
Rrrrrrr
Rrrrrrr[Cueball has stopped pulling on the sword in the stone, which seems to be moving to the right of the panel, with Cueball on top of it]
Rrrrrrrrrrrr
